snippet.title: Tank Team Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2587450/Tank_Team/

Tank Team, the ultimate game of cooperation, coordination and most importantly: communication.

Assemble a team of up to 8 players (recommended 3 minimum) and operate your tank by doing tasks, such as rotating the barrel, loading the shells, setting the power and pressing FIRE!

However, only one member of your team can see outside the tank at a time, so you're going to need precise communication to land your shots...

The last team standing, wins!


Moustached Fella (Me): https://twitter.com/Finndustriess
Screaming Woman: https://twitter.com/toyaloi
Thumbnail: https://twitter.com/nivera_QSD

And special thanks to the playtesters :)
